page.title: 12FARMING
page.content: There are about thirteen farms in the area and most of them grow crops. A few keep poultry and pigs. The most inportant cereal crops are barley and wheat.Another inportant crop is sugar beet which is harvested in the autumn. During May and June many of the fields are golden yellow while the oil seed rape is in blossom. It is harvested in the summer when the seeds are set. Some farmers grow peas and beans which are harvested in the summer. The two most important machines which the farmers use are tractors and combine harvesters. There are a lot of attachments to go on the back of the tractors such as balers, sprayers, ploughs and trailers.
